title: Short-Intensive Flipped Learning-Based English Collocation Knowledge Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Vocabulary Comprehension
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), with real-world job-linked project execution through PBL

learning_goals: Learners can construct sentences using 50 core English collocations (lexical/grammatical) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can enhance collocation utilization by 30% by incorporating peer feedback in PBL assignments
Learners can complete over 90% of pre-learning materials (videos/quizzes) and achieve an 80% or higher participation rate during class sessions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
